meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being bossy.
meanings.sent1: Her bossiness in the group project made everyone feel stressed.
meanings.sent2: I don't appreciate her bossiness when she tries to control everything.
meanings.sent3: Her bossiness over choosing the movie led to a comedy of errors.
meanings.sent4: The bossiness of the toddler trying to direct the game was both amusing and endearing.
meanings.sent5: The bossiness of the teacher was like a dark cloud hanging over the classroom.

meanings.definition: The behavior of someone who gives orders in a domineering manner.
meanings.sent1: His bossiness at work often alienates his colleagues.
meanings.sent2: She displayed her bossiness by constantly telling others what to do.
meanings.sent3: The bossiness of the cat demanding treats was both cute and annoying.
meanings.sent4: Her bossiness in the kitchen was like a chef commanding a brigade.
meanings.sent5: The bossiness of the dictator was evident in every decision he made.
